topics.body:
"@Sollace":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a2a6916368721eba00118d#post_55a2a6916368721eba00118d
I was one of the four co-creators of the site.

For the first year it was great. But as people started getting bored of one another, they started getting mean, and with no new people coming in it all got really, well, nasty. After that people started to leave one by one, and eventually it wasn't worth the monthly fee to keep the site up for like 7 people.
